Description:
The sales Coordinator will be acting as a bridge between Client, Manufacturer and Sales Team. S/He will be responsible for the performance of a variety of duties categorized by sales support including Pre-qualification processes, post-sales support, technical support during installation process, coordinating with manufacturer and documentation etc. 
Manage and review Client’s requirements. Ensure all technical descriptions and specifications are accurate before submitting the report.  
Liaise with manufacturer to arrange documents & specifications based on the product specification provided by Client. 
Prepare comparative analysis report based on the quotations received from different manufacturers. 
Maintains and updates the manufacturer’s list and initiate per-qualification activities with Clients.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor’s degree in business administration from an accredited institution or equivalent. 
More than 4 years previous experience, with a minimum of 2 years relative experience to the responsibilities outlined above.
